title: ES File Explorer Pro v1.0.1
description:
This is the Pro version of ES File Explorer (File Manager) - the must-have app for every Android user.

You can enjoy all the benefits below once you own ES File Explorer Pro!

âœ” Remove Ads - Clean up all Ads in the App
âœ” More to customize - Set start pages & ALL default windows
âœ” More to see - New Theme and color panel
âœ” More to expect - Dozens of new features( totally free) will come soon


Highlights of ES File Explorer (File Manager):
â˜… File Manager: Click to install applications, and check zipped files
â˜… Multimedia Explorer: Click to play music/videos, check image(s) and document(s)
â˜… Cloud Storage: Supports Dropbox, Box.net, Sugarsync, Google Drive, OneDrive(SkyDrive), Amazon S3, Yandex and more clouds platforms.

Features and Benefits of ES File Explorer (File Manager):
â–ºFile Manager: Manage your files just like you do on your desktop or laptop using Multiple Select, Cut/Copy/Paste, Move, Create, Delete, Rename, Search, Share, Send, Hide, Create Shortcut, and Bookmark. All operations can be performed on local files (on your Android device) or even remotely (from your computer over a network)
â–ºApplication Manager: Categorize, uninstall, back up, and create shortcuts to your apps
â–ºRemote File Manager: When this feature is enabled, you can manage files on your phone from your computer
â–ºBuilt-in ZIP and RAR support: Allows you to compress and decompress ZIP files, unpack RAR files, and create encrypted (AES 256 bit) ZIP files
â–ºBuilt-in viewers and players for various file types: Including photos, music, and videos; supports third-party applications such as Quick Office for better productivity
â–ºShows thumbnails: For APKs and images
â–ºText viewers and editors
â–ºAccess your home PC: Through your smartphone via WiFi with SMB
â–ºFunctions as an FTP and WebDAV client: Manage files on FTP, FTPS, SFTP, and WebDAV servers just like you manage files on your SD card
â–ºBluetooth file browser: You can copy and paste files between Bluetooth-ready devices. ES File Explorer (File Manager) supports OBEX FTP for browsing devices and transferring files between Bluetooth devices
â–ºKill tasks with a single click, increase memory and speed up your device: Includes a simple widget that stays on your home screen to let you know your current RAM situation and automatically kill tasks, with an ignore list to ignore the applications you want to keep running. The Task Manager module is required for this feature.
â–ºCache Cleaner and Auto-start Manager: Delete junk files that take up valuable storage space. The Task Manager module is required for this feature.
â–ºRoot Explorer: The ultimate set of file management tools for root users. Provides access to the entire file system and all data directories, and allows the user to change permissions.
â–ºSupports Multiple Languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Czech, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Tamil, Catalan, Turkish, Lithuanian, Portuguese and more..

What's New:

V1.0.1
*Add Material Theme(ES V4.0 Style)
*Fix Root Explorer issue
*Replace MORE with WINDOW in double toolbar

More info:
 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.estrongs.android.pop.pro
